snippet: German authorities carried out a nationwide crackdown on Thursday on an ultraconservative Islamic organization, raiding homes, meeting halls and mosques.
abstract: German authorities carry out a nationwide crackdown on Millatu Ibrahim, an ultraconservative Islamic organization, raiding homes, meeting halls and mosques; group had been calling on Muslims to reject German law and follow Islamic Shariah law.
lead_paragraph: German authorities carried out a nationwide crackdown on Thursday on an ultraconservative Islamic organization, raiding homes, meeting halls and mosques.

headline.seo: Germany: Islamist Group Millatu Ibrahim Banned
